name: MTLAccelerationStructureBoundingBoxGeometryDescriptor
desc: A description of a list of bounding boxes to turn into an acceleration structure.

items.name: var boundingBoxCount: Int
items.desc: The number of bounding boxes in the bounding box buffer.

items.name: var boundingBoxBuffer: MTLBuffer?
items.desc: A buffer that contains bounding box data.

items.name: var boundingBoxBufferOffset: Int
items.desc: The offset, in bytes, to the first bounding box in the buffer.

items.name: var boundingBoxStride: Int
items.desc: The stride, in bytes, between bounding boxes in the buffer.
